form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Perman. Residence, FORM I-45 ( (REV. 2-27-87)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/25/2023 U.S. Department of Justice OMB # 1115-0053 Immigration and Naturalization Service (IN Application for Permane - Residence DO NOT WRITE IN THIS BLOCK Case ID# Action Stamp Fee Stamp A# 871 829 6791 APPROVED INS DISTRICT DIRECTOR G-28 or Volag# Section of Law MAY 17 1993 Eligibility Under Sec. 245 Sec. 209(b). INA Approved Visa Petition Sec 214(d), INA Dependent of Principal Alien Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 Recomme Special Immigrant Sec 245. INA Other 11/24/92 Sec. 249. INA Preference 14:05 Country Chargeable 120.U A. Reason for this application I am applying for lawful permanent residence for the following reason: (check the box that applies) 1. An Immigrant visa number is immediately available to me because A visa petition has already been approved for me (approval notice is attached) A visa petition is being filed with this application 2. I entered as the flance(e) of a U.S. citizen and married within 90 days (approval notice and marriage certificate are attached) 3. I am an asylee eligible for adjustment 4. Other: Mother of a U.S. citizen B. Information about you 1. Name (Family name in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. On what date did you last enter the U.S.? APRIL 15, 1989 LOPEZ Julia Amelia 2. Address (Number and Street) (Apartment Number) 12. Where did you last enter the U.S.? (City and State) 7603 California Ave. "A" Los Angeles, CAlifornia (Town or City) (State/Country) (ZIP/Postal Code) 13. What means of travel did you use? (Plane, car. etc.) Huntington Park, CAlifornia. 90255 Airplane 3. Place of Birth (Town or City) (State/Country) 14. Were you Inspected by a U.S. Immigration officer? Managua, Managua/Nicaragua Yes No 4. Date of Birth 5. Sex 6. Marital Status 15. In what status did you last enter the U.S.? (Mo/Day/Yr) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, temporary worker, Male Married Single without inspection, etc.) 5-22-12 Female Widowed Divorced Visitor 7. Social Security Number 8. Alien Registration Number (if any) 16. Give your name EXACTLY as It appears on your Arrival/Departure Record (Form I-94). 620-14-2535 N/A 9. Country of Citizenship JULIA CARDOZA DE LOPEZ 17. Arrival/Departure Record (I-94) Number 18. Visa Number Nicaragua 10. Have you ever applied for permanent resident status in the U.S.? 005732 0 3 5 2 Yes No 19. At what Consulate was your nonimmigrant visa issued? Date (If Yes, give the date and place of filing and final disposition) (Mo/Dav/Xr) MANAGUA NICARAGUA C.A. 02-04-88 20. Have you ever been married before? Yes No If Yes, (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) 21. Has your husband/wife ever been married before? Yes No If Yes. (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) INITIAL RECEIPT RESUBMITTED RELOCATED COMPLETED Rec'd Sent Approved Denied Returned FORM I-485 (REV. 2-27-87)N
